means: 不会接受（或容纳）的，反应不快的，接受能力不强的

sentence.Network_en: Now, when she saw how unreceptive these two people were, she hoped he would not.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在看出他们夫妻俩不爱应酬待客的脾气, 她希望他还是别来.

sentence.Network_en: Several prospective buyers had approached Mr Groenink before but, until now, had found him unreceptive.
sentence.Network_cn: 包括荷兰零售集团在内的众多长期投资者也加入了TCI的阵营.

sentence.Network_en: Clomiphene sometimes can alter endometrial thickness, making it thin and unreceptive to implantation.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候克罗米酚能改变子宫内膜厚度, 使之变薄,不宜种植.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 托福词汇同义词组大全,托福词汇同义词... ... unqualified 不合格的; 无条件的 unreceptive 接受能力差的 unresolved 未解决的.
接受能力的英文|接受能力是什么意思... ... 3. 分类的接受能力: RFFC 接受能力不强 ： unreceptive 有接受能力的 ： receptive.
经典加试大全... ... Q11:blur- ------模糊不清； Q5:unreceptive- -------不会接受或容纳 Q7:reinforce- ------求援；.
a closed mind unreceptive to new ideas ., 封闭的头脑不易接受新事物.

auth_sentence.content: I did offer to work with him and his ministry on what was acceptable and unacceptable, but the Minister was unreceptive.
